noun.description: Gunnery. A metal plate covering the cheeks of a gun carriage. Now historical and rare.
Saddlery. A metal plate on the cantle of a saddle-tree.

Zoology. A bony or chitinous plate forming (part of) the outer surface of an animal's head; (in an arthropod) the head capsule, or one of the sclerites forming it; (in a reptile) any of the scales on the head.
